messages.1000096355:
Soars into the air and crashes down, dealing significant damage to the surrounding enemies. Creates a very high threat level and reduces attack power of attacked enemies. Can be used by pressing the #yJump Key#w in midair.
#yLight Attribute
Physical ATK {0}%
Can be used in midair
#yEnemy's ATK reduced by {1}%
Duration {2} sec
messages.1000085222:
Attains additional #y[Guardian Bubble]#w and can move while taking the #y[Defensive Stance]#w.
Damage equal to Physical ATK will be dealt when defence is successful and attack area is increased. 
Can use #y[Jump Key]#w to jump when you  move to the front and back or stay still during #y[Defensive Stance]#w, When moving sideways in #y[Defensive Stance]#w, use #y[Jump Key]#w to cancel the stance.
#y[Aerial Block]#w is activated automatically when you jump.
#yDeflective damage for successful defence (100% of Physical ATK)
Attain {0} Guardian Bubble(s)
messages.1000072300: Counterattack damage is changed to Light Attribute and Normal Attack button can be used additionally after the counterattack to shoot light energy to the front. Invincible at the moment of shooting.\n#yATK per light energy hit (Physical ATK's {0}%)
messages.1000072304: While Divine Punishment is effective, continuous damage is dealt on nearby enemies.\n#yLight Attribute\nContinuous Damage ATK per hit (Physical ATK's {0}%)
messages.1000059055: When you block all enemy attacks with successful defence actions, you will get a buff for #y{0} sec#w that increases your Physical ATK by #y{1}%#w.\n#yCooldown {2} sec
messages.1000076727: Justice Crash is enhanced. When the character is in the air, the enemies are hit up into the air and pulled to thrash them back onto the ground. However, targets will not be hit up into the air when you use jump key\n#y{0}% additional damage when going up

messages.1000085223:
Attains additional #y[Guardian Bubble]#w and can move while taking the #y[Defensive Stance]#w. Damage equal to Physical ATK will be dealt when defence is successful, and counterattack area is increased. Additionally, #y[Divine Ascension]#w and #y[Divine Vengeance]#w can be used during #y[Defensive Stance]#w.
Can use #y[Jump Key]#w to jump when you  move to the front and back or stay still during #y[Defensive Stance]#w, When moving sideways in #y[Defensive Stance]#w, use #y[Jump Key]#w to cancel the stance.
#y[Aerial Block]#w is activated automatically when you jump.
#yDeflective damage for successful defence ({0}% of Physical ATK)
Attain {1} Guardian Bubble(s)
